Replies.Reply: Join the mobile infantery and save the world !
The Bugs send another meteor our way !
But this time we are ready !
To ensure the safety of our solar system, Klendathu must be eliminated !
We break net now and take you live to Klendathu where the invasion has begun !
From all over the known Galaxy, prospectice citizens work together to make a better tomorrow !
A murderer was captured and tried today.
If you think you are psychic, maybe you are.
Disregarding Federal warnings, Mormon extremists established Port Joe Smith, a settlement of 300 on Tango Urilla, a system just inside the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.
Too late they realized tha Tango Urilla had already been chosen by other colonists -- Arachnids !
The council asks future colonists to obey all official Federal warnings.
The Federal Court met moments ago and voted unanimously for mobilization to destroy the Arachnid threat.
Out of the ashes of Buenos Aires comes first sorrow, then ANGER !
Would you like to know more ?
Cap Troopers establish a foothold on Dantana, a planet system at the outer edge of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone. Casualties are high, but casualties won't stop the Mobile Infantery !
Everyone's doing their share. Are you ?
Sky Marshall Dienes announces plans for an offensive against Klendathu, source of the bug meteor that destroyed Buenos Aires.
We now break net and take you live to Fleet Battle Station Ticonderoga deep inside the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.
Crsisis for Humankind ! Fleet official admit they underestimated the Arachnid's defensive capability.
Accepting responsibility for Klendathu, Sky Marshall Dienes resigns. His successor, Sky Marshall Tahat Meru, outlines her new strategy.

Families oof those who have died or become incapacitated by Federal Service are entitled to benefits ! If you see the name of a loved one, please do not call. A Federation official will call you. Would you like to know more ?
No one here in the AQZ knows when the invasion of Kendathu will occur, but everyone's talking about it, and the talk says tomorrow !
Here's a bunch of M.I. kids who look like they eat bugs for lunch !
We've just landed here on what cap troopers are calling the "Big K" with the 6th Mobile Infantery Division. It's an ugly planet, a bug planet, a planet hostile to life as we kow iGKKKKK !
THIS WAY !
KITTEN !
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA !
Sorry, Mr. Rasczak.
The difference lies in the field of civic virtue. A citizen accepts personal responsibility for the safety of the body politic, of which he is a member, defending it, if need be, with his life.
Uh, I don't know.
How should I know ?
Good for you.
What's the hurry ?
Did you read her mind ?
Yeah, but I want Carmen.
Who ?
I have good reflexes.
Aw, c'mon, it's just a bug.
Better put your goggles on.
that dumb with numbers.
Who cares about bugs ? You can't go anywhere if you don't know math.
Then how come you won't hold hands with me at school ?
Why won't you kiss me when we're all alone ?
It's all I think about anymore.
Why not ?
Carl can wait.
Well, if your dad doesn't like me, how come we're such good friends ?
Ace of spades.
In addition to "psychic dolt" this test also proves I'm unlucky ? Two of hearts.
I wouldn't want to know what everyone was thinking. Four of spades.
He just wants attention. You don't play with him like you used to.
How do you make him do that ?
Carl, promise me you won't ever do anything like that to me.
I've been thinking about applying for Federal Service, too. Fleet, maybe.
I'm eighteen. It's my decision, I think I'd make a pretty good pilot. I've good great reflexes. You need that for maneuvering, you know.
All I know is Carmen's going to be a citizen, and I don't think it'll work out for us if I'm not.
Queen of hearts.
We tumble good, too.
A lot can happen in three minutes.
Don't get any ideas. She's my girl.
What ?
Just throw me the ball, Diz.
Aw, don't get mushy.
It's aterm of service, not a career. I just want to get out on my own and see the Galaxy for a couple of years.
Mr. Rasczak.
No, Mr. Rasczak doesn't do that at all.
I'm eighteen. It's my decision.
Uh, no.
Wow ! Santori and Zegema Beach, I've always wanted to go there.
Wait a minute ! Carl is doing his Federal and he isn't inferior. He's the smartest kid at school !
I don't know what they teach at Harvard, but I think I'm pretty good enough the way I am !
Well, that's what you're saying ! You're saying that I'm not good enough the way I am now !
You still gonna play for Brazil ?
Well, anyone who gets you is lucky.
Can't we just be friends, Diz ?
You're the best.
Isn't it great to be in love ?
Wait, I want to talk to Mr. Rasczak.
Mister Rasczak ?
I just wanted to say thanks 'cause History and Moral Philosophy was the best class I had this year.
I wanna join up, Mr. Rasczak. I think I have what it take to be a citizen.
Yeah, sure, I guess.
What are you talking about ? We both know you're gonna be a pilot.
You two have so much in common.
I can't help it.
I don't even know if you're my girl.
I'm gonna do it, Carmen. I'm gonna sign up for Federal Service.
Who cares ?
I love you, Carmen.
Maybe Carmen's gonna make her own decisions from now on, Mr. Ibanez.
Here in Buenos Aires.
No, sir.
Courage, I guess.
Wow, that's great.
I want to be a pilot, sir.
Naw, I made it, Carl made it.
He was in the group with me.
I don't believe it !
Whoa ! Way to go, boy-yo !
Infantery, sir.
I'll go for that.
My father's probably gonna kill me.
I won't quit !
I'm not going on vacation ! I want to be acitizen ! It's my decision. I made it.
Don't talk about my girl that way.
You're late.
Me, too. I'm wearing everything I own.
Who cares ! The Federation'll give me everything I need for the next two years, right ?
He left this morning. He couldn't say where.
I'm gonna miss you.
I love you.
Com'on, just say it. Try it on for size.
Do you mean it ?
He's good alright.
Better get in line like everyone else, Ace.
No thanks, Diz.
You are. I joined up to get out on my own. And you had to tag along.
You saying you didn't ?
Wanting it doesn't make you the best one for the job.
Well, maybe you better look again.
Aw, who asked you to be so nosey ?
Hey, do you mind ?
Uh-oh, I gotta pack it in. I hope you're having fun, hope you're careful.
Bye ! Write me ! I'm gonna kill you guys !
What ?
Cover me.
Thanks, pal.
Sir, thank you, sir !
I just want you guys to know that I'll never do anything that I haven't asked you to do first.
Couldn't've done it without you, Diz.
Bet it's from my girl.
It's what I deserve.
I joined up for her. I wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for her.
Thanks, Ace.
Sir, yes, sir !
CROSSFIRE ! EVERYBODY DOWN !
Alright, no more screw ups. Ace takes point. Diz, you and Kitten Smith cover the flanks. Djana'd, you're rear guard.
What's the problem ?
Let me see.
Sir, yes, sir. Breckinridge reported a helmet malfunction, and I asked him to show it to me, sir.
Sir, no, sir.
You disobeyed safety regulation 21-404.
Sir, no, sir !
I don't stay where I'm not wanted.
Hey, they humiliated me in front of everyone ! I'm just supposed to take it, huh ? Well, I'm not gonna, and I guess that proves I just can't cut it.
Hi, mom.
Well, see ya.
What's that, Diz ?
Hey, Kitten, what's going on ?
Oh, jeez, is that Geneva ?
Sir, I wish to reconsider my request to drop out, sir.
Sir, i know it was wrong. I didn't learn from one mistake and I made another, sir.
Sir, yes it is, sir.
Yeah, well, I'm from Buenos Aires, and I say kill'em all !
How can you tell ?
What do I want with a scar ?
What happened to your hair ?
It's alright, I guess. You hear from anyone made it out of B.A. alive ?
I try just to be happy I'm still alive.
Should I be ?
I get it. This is the part that's best for both of us.
You got something to say about the Mobile Infantery ?
Not with an officer, no, sir.
YAAAAAAAA !
Death to all bugs !
Lieutenant's bought the farm.
Don't waste your ammon on the workers !
C'mon, Katrina was right. We gotta get out of here !
It's a general retreat ! The boats are coming down.
C'mon, let's go ! ON THE BOUNCE !
KITTEN !
AAAAAAAAAAAAA !
Seeing as how we're about all that's left of  1st Brigade, you'd have to call that an improvement.
You top kick ?
I wouldn't mind.
I always wanted to go to Zegema Beach.
Fire in the hole !
WATCH OUT !
Uni High Tigers, sir. Don't you remember ? I was captain of the team.
I'm gonna need a squad leader.
What about it, Diz ?
What kind of stinkin' bug is that ?
What's that ?
Must fill your bottle up real quick when your wife and kids get smeared.
All dead except one, sir.
Yes, sir.
I said no. Want me to pull rank ?
May I have the honor ?
Yes, sir !
They ran out of names a long time ago in this part of the galaxy.
Yes, sir.
Diz, see what you can do.
Looks like a bug was in his brain, sir.
Diz, what's with the uplink ?
What's going on, Diz ?
We don't have a minute !
All bands.
SHUT UP, SIR ! We need pick up now !
Landing zone is extremely hostile.
Then I hope you have a crazy pilot ! Keep the line open, Dizzy !
Boat coming down, sir !
Not enough, I guess.
Yes, sir !
Cover us, Ace !
Hit your jets, sir !
We're not leaving you here, sir !
Give'em hell, sir !
No, you're gonna be alright, Diz !
This would be mine, sir. Acting Sergeant John Rico. I've assumed command on this mission.
I'm not, but alot of my soldiers are.
We gotta choke on the mud and the blood and Fleet can't be bothered to spit.
That was just a mix up.
What happened to your eye ?
Officer on deck !
Womb to tomb, cap trooper !
How are you, Carl ?
Bugs laid a trap, didn't they ?
Didn't they tell you, Colonel ?
The Roughnecks are always ready, sir.
See you on the bounce !
I only have two rules. Rule one, everyone fights. Rule two, no one quits. If you don't do your job, I'll kill you myself.
Who're all these kids ?
We're the old men, Ace.
We'll take this high ground. Lookouts there and therte and up there. If the bugs come upstairs in this neighbor-hood, we'll be the first to know.
Down there on the flats, eh ?
Alright, cut it out. We will deploy from skimmers in teams of six.
Would'ya mind moving your boat ?
You're standing on my H.Q., Lieutenant !
Saddle up, boys, that's our trash !
What's your problem now, Lieutenant ?
Any survivors ?
We've gotta go get her !
We're outa here. Lieutenant, get your men into the skimmers. This real estate's about to go buggy.
Form a perimeter !
I'm gonna save Carmen.
Yeah, that's right.
Move out.
I'll take you with me.
Take my hand !
Weapon !
Are you hurt ?
Can you walk ?
Let's get some armor on her, and the we'll get outa this stinkin bug hole !
Yeah, if I live through this, they'll probably hang me.
Up. We gotta be near A Company by now.
FALL BACK !
How bad are you, pal ?
Sir, I'd like to turn myself in.
Yes, sir.
No. Something given has no value !
When you vote, you're exercising political authority. You're using force. And force, my friends, is violence, the supreme authority from which all other authority derives.
In my classroom, you bet. Whether it's exerted by ten or ten billion, political authority is violence by degree. The people we call citizens have earned the right to wield it.
Really ? I wonder what the city fathers of Hiroshima would have to say about that.
Correct. Naked force has settled more issues in history than any other factor.
You. Tell me the moral difference, if any, between the citizen and the civilian ?
The exact words of the text. But do you understand it ?
Of course you don't. I doubt if any of you here would recognize 'civic virtue' if it bit you in the ass.
Well, that's it. Have a nice life.
What is it, Rico ?
Well, it's not really my job to please.
Good for you. Go find out.
Figuring things out for yourself is the only freedom anyone really has.
This is for you new people. I only have two rules. Rule one, everyone fights. Rule two, no one quits.
Get rid of the jewelry. I hate it.
Alright. There's a new Sky Marshall and a new plan. We're gonna clean out the systems outlying Klendathu one planet at a time. Tomorrow we hit Tango Urilla.
Spread out, teams of three. When you locate a bug hole, secure it, gas it, and close it.
Sugar, in for pick up !
Gas that hole and close it !
Where'd you learn to do that, soldier ?
I'm not interested in nostalgia, Rico, I need a corporal. You're it until you're dead or I find someone better.
Don't worry, Birdie, your next arm comes with a factory guarantee !
Saddle up, Roughnecks. That's our trash !
We must be right over the colony.
Corporal, I want pulse cannons there and there ! Rifle teams, spread out along the ridge ! Sugar, bring up that flame thrower !
They'd rather spend our lives than risk their ships. Who's got the nuke ?
Heat it up.
Roughnecks, you may fire at will.
FIRE ! BLAST SHIELDS DOWN !
HIT THE DIRT !
Kill the bitch.
I expect the best, but I give the best.
Yopu asked me some advice once, Rico.
Never pass up a good thing, eh ?
My job is to protect the lives of my soldiers so they can kill bugs, Major, and if you're walking me into a trap-
Yes, sir.
Corporal, the Roughnecks are moving out for Planet P immediately. Get yourself squared away and report to Gillespie for logistics.
Who's that with you ?
Report in ten minutes.
Keep trying, Sergeant.
LET'S GO ! ON THE BOUNCE !
Gillespie, put in call for retrieval.
Throw a rifle !

Rico, you're acting Sergeant now.
What's that look like to you, Rico ?
Gas that hole and seal it.
Pick up the general !
General Owen, sir ?
To all Roughnecks, this is Rasczak.
Warm it all up ! Everything you got !
Rico, Flores, Watkins, Levy ! We control the sky until retrieval !
Make every shot count !
Sergeant, secure the boat !
Board the wounded !
Move to retrieval on my command !
AAAAAAAAAAAA !

This is my farm. Get on the boat, NOW ! That's an order, Sergeant.
C'mon you sons of bitches !
Gee, we always thought you were the supreme authority, Mr. Rasczak.
You still haven't kissed her yet ? Don't lie.
Others are waiting.
You got it bad.
Don't forget about this afternoon.
He's always late when he walks you home to fish for a kiss.
Statistically speaking you should've accidentally guessed right by know.
Luck is not a factor. No one really knows why some people are sensitive and some aren't.
Cyrano, you big yellow turd !
Go bug Mom, Cyrano.
I gave him the impression that there was a fly crawling up my mom's leg. He is going to go eat it.
Passport to the Universe.
Your father will never let you.
Only 1 in 14 male applicants make it through stellar navigation.
If you can't do those numbers, you haven't got a chance.

Outa the way you two !
That's us. Where do we sign ?
No.
Well, everyone's a little impressed by this.
But here's a tip: Aim for the nerve stem and put it down for good.
Now while you are out killing bugs, we want you to be our eyes and ears.
This conference is over. Do your duty, Lieutenant. That's an order.
Please continue, Sergeant.
Elegant proof of intelligence, isn't it ? We thought there might be a brain on P.

Tesla's tough. They tumble good and they hit HARD.
Kick three, fade left. On two.
Flip six, three hole. Rico ?

Coming through !

I got power ! Gimme a minute !

C'mon Johnny, we'll be late for Biology.
Eeuch !
But we 're intelligent. Human minds have invented art, mathematics and interstellar travel.
Well, at least you didn't lose your lunch over a bug. How embarassing.

I don't want everyone to see.
How come that's all you talk about anymore ?
You can't walk me home.
I thought you were going to help Carl.
Johnny, my Dad's home today.
It's not you, Johnny. Your parents are rich they don't need to be citizens, and that stuff means a lot to my dad. He's a veteran.
Sometimes I do what I want, eh ?
Are you alright ?
Everyone is going to the dance. Aren't you ?
You're going to the Academy ?
Don't you have to finish the game ?
How do I know if this is love ?
I'll meet you outside.
Johnny, this is Zander.

Zander is going for pilot, too.
Johnny Rico, you're jealous !
He's nothing like you.
Are you the boy for me ?
Sorry, Dad. See you, Johnny.
Shhh ! Don't make him feel worse.
I'm gonna go for pilot.
Hey, Carl, what's wrong ?
Let's all make a vow. Let's swear we'll always be friends no matter what.
I can't wait to tell my Dad I'm in.
My Dad had to help me pack. Suddenly he's afraid he's never gonna see me again or something. It was sweet, but it took forever. Anyway, I guess I'm ready to go.
Poor boy. I'm sorry your parents were so mad.
You talk to Carl ?
It's exciting, but it's scary, too isn't it.
I'll miss you, too, Johnny.
Oh, that's me.
Alright, I love you.
I said it. Isn't that enough ?
Looking it down !
This is nothing. Today, I get to fly that !
Pilot Trainee Ibanez reporting for duty, ma'am.
Yes, ma'am !
Hey ! What are you doing here ?
It's amazing, us running into each other like this. Maybe it's fate.
Yes, ma'am.
In simulation, my supervisors could never keep up.
Oh, yes, sir. Vector ?
Hi, Johnny, I would've written sooner, but they've really got us going every moment here.
I'm glad you're doing so well. If they haven't made you squad leader by now, I'm sure you will.
And that's also the problem because I don't really want to get married, Johnny. I don't want to have kids.
Thanks. You read my mind. Third watch always seems to last forever.
No, I replotted the course. It's more efficient this way.
Hey, check it.
Don't change the subject. Am I right ?
Don't mess with the boss. So what'd the captain say ?
You and me, huh ?
No, what do you want ?
WHERE IS IT ?
Thank you, ma'am.
Hey	Johnny !	Johnny Rico !
What do you think ? Everyone did it when we got our wings. You don't like it, do you ?
It's funny. Sometimes I forget. Then it hits me, and I can't stop crying.
You don't look very happy to see me.
Zander, you remember Johnny ?
What's wrong with you ?
stare at the BATTLE-SCARED STARSHIPS and BURNT-OUT HULKS that line the docks of Ticonderoga.
You know, we're lucky to be alive.
So who's got time to get married ?
No, funny there's almost no wounded at all.
Oh no.
No, I think something's up. The Sky Marshall's here.
Almost got knocked out of the sky over Big K.
A funeral.
Yeah.
I don't know, Zander.
Well, look at this. The three of us back together again.

Take care, wilya Johnny ?
Where's Lieutenant Barcalow ?
Prepare for warp !

This is Lieutenant Carmen Ibanez.
AAAAAAAAAAAAAA !
AAAAAAAAAAAAAA !
I thought I was dead. Lucky for me you jokers showed up, eh ?
Is it true ?
Which way ?
Zander, what are you doing ?
Hey, Rico, we gonna take Tesla ?
You're captain of the team !
For our final today, please identify the mouthparts, the abdominal organs, and for extra credit, locate the nerve cord and count the ganglia.

Just a bug, eh ? We humans like to think we are Nature's finest achievement. I'm afraid it isn't true. This Arkellian Sand Beetle is superior in many ways. It has fewer moving parts, can reproduce itself in vast numbers, and unboud by concerns of ego and mortality, makes the perfect selfless member of society.
Our galaxy is teaming with insect life. We have identified over two billion species so far.

True, we know of no insect society that has produced a Shakespeare, an Einstein or a Cherynkov, but before you let that go to your head, take the example of the Arachnids, a highly organized, highly evolved insect society.

They are relatively stupid by human standards. Workers have an IQ of 12, warriors around 35 , and yet the Arachnids have colonized planets. Over a million years of evolution, Nature has provided the Arachnids with the biological means to hurl their spore into space.
Time's running out.
I'm getting better.
So what are you doing later ?
I don't know. It's my last night as acivilian.
I'm all ears.
You can never be sure.
Yeah, we know each other from the game. No hard feeling, eh, chum ?
Always.
I'm the guy who's gonna teach you to fly this crate.
Only when I give you an order.
Maybe not. I heard about this crazy girl coming through the academy, solid math, a little wild on the stick, but a natural.
This isn't simulation anymore.
Twenty-five by five, roll seven.
They revoke our flight status.
Three weeks aboard a starship and you know it all, huh ?
Trajectory indicates it came out of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.
Everything coposetic, Lieutenant ?
Best in the Fleet !
Forget it, Carmen. The Mobile Infantery does a thankless, dirty job, so they naturally tend to be short-tempered, thoughtless and rude.
You heard me. Wanna make something out of it, private ?
It's alright. What's he gonna do ?
Two more bursts of bug plasma streak past.
That's it, we're empty ma'am !
Give me hand, willya ?
I was thinking. Maybe we should get married, Carmen.
If we're gonna be a team, why not be a real team ?
So ?
Fleet encourages marriages among flight officers. You'd probably get a promotion out of it.
I'm not kidding. Marriage is -
Hey, bugs don't take prisoners.
I'm sorry, Carmen.
You're upset, that's alright.
On whose authority, Corporal ?
Where are you going ?
How do you feel about him now ?
I do.
This is a Fleet-driven operation, son, and the Fleet thinks my boat will be safer on the high ground.
I'll take the first group.
You know as well as I do she's probably already dead.
Hey, just calm down, I'm giving the orders here-
AAAAAAAAAAA !
Thanks.
What do you think you're doing ?
That would mean a comlete disregard for the mission objective. They hang you for that, Rico.
Let's go.
AAAAAAAAAAAAA !
Not a problem.
Been better, buddy.
Just giving you something to remember me by, baby.
Wait you two. Dad and I have a surprise for you that will settle this.
Johnny, please. Calm yourself.
Why did you go and do that ? He was all ready to go Zegema Beach !
Johnny, why won't you change your mind ?
I hope so. I hope you don't ruin your life over some silly little girl who wants to look handsome in a uniform.
Well, of course you should come home immedietly !
We'll all have dinner. I'll fix your favorite.
Oh, my, what's that ?
This came for you today. I presume on your request.
Have you lost you lost your mind ? I'd rather take ten lashes in Public Square than see you ruin your life.
Who gave you this idea ? It's that teacher.
Good, because you're going to Harvard, and that's the end of it.
Oh, is that how it is ?
A trip to the Outer Rings.
A year at Harvard and you'll  see this "Federal Service" is just menial training for inferior people so they can call themselves "citizens" and take airs for the rest of their lives.
Teenagers !
You'll resign, and that's all there is to it.
I'm telling you, you will !
Well, it's just good to hear from you.
Don't talk like that. Get yourself home as fast as you can.
Looks like rain.
Alright, everybody, this is the last dance, so let's turn down the lights and make it a slow one.
Hey, you, there's a place for that !
Fresh meat for the grinder, eh ?
Here and here and here.
Welcome to the adventure of Federal Service.
They put me out front to discourage the weak-hearted, but at the end of the day I go home.
Good for you. We need every pilot we can get.
Next time we meet, I'll probably have to salute you. What about you, son ?
Well, good for you. The Mobile Infantery made me the man I am today.
constitutonal rights.
They took my sister, they'll take anybody.
Oh, this is the part that hurts !
No talking please. I'm going to ask you some questions. Please answer all questions truthfully.
Are your parents currently citizens ?
Which do you think is more important, courage or confidence ?
Please complete this sentence.
I'm happy to tell you that you've been accepted for Federal Service.
Looks like you're quite an athlete.
My job is to dertermine what you're best suited for.
Sorry, son, no way. Your school records say you don't have the math skills.
It looks like the only thing you're good for is cannon fodder.
Sir, yes, sir !
Sir, yes, sir !
Yes, sir !
Yes, sir !

The problem with you is that none of you are good enough the way you are.  Johnny stands in formation with his squad, among them:  BRECKINRIDGE, 18, DJANA'D, 19, KATRINA McINTIRE, 18, ACE LEVY, 18, SHUJUMI, 18, and KITTEN SMITH, 18.

Do you think I'm funny ? Do I make you laugh ? Do you think I'm a comedian ?

RUN, I SAID. Bronski, keep pace !
You are now all brothers and sisters in the same family, my family, the Mobile Infantery. I will be your mother.

MEDIC !
Good. Who's next ?
MEDIC !

Is that all you got ? You hit like kitten, Smith !
You will not like me.
But if you survive you will thank me because you will be born again hard.
Put your hand on the post, private.
The enemy cannot push a button if you disable his hand. MEDIC !
C'mon, move it, you apes !
The object of this exercise is to capture your enemy's flag before your enemy captures yours.
These weapons have been modified for this exercise. If your enemy hits you, your suit will fail. You will be unable to move. You will be as good as dead.
Smith, GO ! McIntire, GO ! Flores, GO !
With the Marauder's visual capabilities, all you have to do is look at something to hit it, so you will exercise EXTREME CARE on my firing line.

The Marauder power suit will prevent serious injury, but if you are hit, you will be non-operational and your team score will suffer accordingly. Rico, has each member of your squad completed a weapons safety check ?
Perfect score for this exercise is 300.
Rico, you are relieved of squad command.
Alright, let's go, Rico.
Bite on this. It helps. I know.
I'm serious, sir. I'll go anywhere.
Yes, sir, I get you.
Is that your signature, Rico ?
Doesn't look like it to me.
Get outa here, private.
YEOW !
Off you go down Washout Lane, bye-bye !
We all have one thing in common. We were all stupid enough to sign up for Mobile Infanterie. What's your excuse, Breckinridge ?
So the grow 'em big and dumb on the farm planet, eh ?	Djana'd ?
Your turn, Rico !
You are now prisoners of the Blue Team.
I'm going in ! Let's go !
Look at him. Do you think anyone has ever been so pleased with himself ?
I just hope it's not over before we get in it !
That guy's been in it.
The eyes. He's got the 1000 meters stare.
Get any what on you ?
Well, here's to it ! We're gonna fightn, and we're gonna win !
Sir, I guess maybe I do, sir.
Sir, yes, sir. It's my arm. I think it's broken, sir.
Come on, Ace, back off the line !
Well, my family is all farmers. I hate farming.
Don't look that way to me.
Dunno. Display's fritzed.
I'll bet he makes squad leader.
I wanna be a mom. It's easier to get a licence if you've served.
Hey, what's going on ?
Hi, Carmen !
Goddam bugs whacked us, Johnny.
Let's get out of here !
AAAAAAAAAAAAA !
He'll have to get past me.
AWK !
Aw, you either got what it takes or you don't.
At ease, soldier. It's all the same muck.
You got some guts for a rich kid.
Hey, don't laugh. Everyone oughta have a friend like me !
Oh, yeah ? I don't see anyone else here with the chops to lead.
Zim hadda choose someone to be his brown nose, I guess.
Yeow, Rico, you don't deserve that !
Funny how they always want to be your friends after they kick your guts out.
Whad'ya talkin  about ?
You made squad leader on your own, and, hey, you still got me to kick around.
Hey, shoot a nuke down a bug hole, lotta dead bugs, am I right ?
Great scars.
I say we all go to the laser parlor and get cut together.
No, this hurts.
Mobile Infantery rules !
Officer on deck !
KILL IT !
I didn't see him !
Retrieval !
Yeah, well, I hear he's a real nutbuster.
Is your Lieutenant as bad as they say ?
Sounds like he is quite a guy.
There.
No way. Big K taught me I ain't executive material.
Lieutenant, I think you're gonna wanna see this, sir.
Dirty bugs came in right when they were having chow !
Officer on the deck, sir.
Lieutenant, we got trouble !
Getting low here, sir !
Officer on the deck !
Got it. Fleet tactical wants to know where they can deploy the skimmers.
Fleet Command says retrieval's no go.
Bug hunt !
Yes, sir !

Carmen ! Ooh la la, Carmencita !
Orbit in five, Ibanez ! First one there gets to fly !
Geez, I thought I liked to fly fast !
Take the number one chair, Ibanez.
Prepare for departure.
Alright, take her out, Ibanez.
Steady as she goes, number one.
Report.
In this part of the system ?
Where'd it come from ?
Number 4, contact Fleet and tell 'em there's a loose asteroid headed their way.

Good work, Number 1. You'll do.
Steady as she goes, Number 1.
This isn't random or light.
Someone made a big goddam mistake !
He requested a combat assignment.
Evasive action !
AAAAAAAAAAA !

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA !
One.
Two.
Three.
Four.
Five.
Your call's going through, Rico.
Sir, yes, sir !
Communications are down, ma'am.
Hull's compromised. We're lucky to be alive, ma'am.
Your transmission has been terminated due to atmospheric interference. Please try your call again later.
It's war !
The only good bug is a dead bug !

We are a generation commanded by fate to defend humankind ! We must meet the threat with our valor, our blood, with our very lives, to insure that human civilization, not insect, dominates this galaxy now and always.
I guess it's not so bad. I mean as long as you don't get any on you.
Oh, you'll know when it happens.
Up there on the ridge ! We'll nuke those bug positions from theAAAAAAAA !
Take my hand !
That'll be all, Major. Dismissed.
Are you kidding ? They always get killed.
Good luck. It's not there anymore.
Mine, too.
You never seen how they do it before ?
It's gonna pop !
Geez, I don't think I've ever seen him smile.
Fire in the hole !
Here they come !
I would. Nice earring.
Outer rings. Zegema Beach.
No one talks about the Lieutenant that way.
Rasczak's Roughnecks !
Stow it, trooper. Give it verything you've got !
AAAAAAAAAAAAA !
Attention !
Sir, look !
Now comes the part I hate the most.
We go down into the colony and make sure all the queens are dead.
I don't understand it, Lieutenant.
AAAAAAAAAAA !
Owen reported the eradication of a low generation colony a month ago. That's why MICOM wants onsite assessment.
Take your group down to P and have a look see. Leave the thinking to us, Lieutenant. That's not your job.
I was forced to hide, of course. The security of the Federation in this theater of operations was at stake !
They weren't gonna do it to me.
What is your position ?
Inside 4th brigade compound ?
Womb to tomb !
We get you, sir !
We get you, sir !
BUG HUNT !
